#include<bits/stdc++.h>

#define mod 1000000007
#define f(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define ff(i,a)  for(i=0;i<a;i++)
#define sc scanf
#define pr printf
#define clr(a) memset(a,0,sizeof(a))
#define ll long long 
#define vi vector<int>
#define pin(n) printf("%d\n",n)
#define pll(n) printf("%lld\n",n)
#define sin(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define sll(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define pins(n) printf("%d ",n)
#define plls(n) printf("%lld ",n)
#define ss(n) scanf("%s",n)
#define nl pr("\n")

using namespace std;

char a[100005];
int l;
int count1[100005][3];


int find(int x)
{
	int i,j,k;
	i=j=k=0;

	int t;
	ff(t,l-x+1)
	{
		if(!t)
		{
			if(count1[t+x-1][0]>0 && count1[t+x-1][1]>0 && count1[t+x-1][2]>0)
			{
	//			pins(t);pin(x);
				return 1;
			}
		}
		else
		{
			if((count1[t+x-1][0]-count1[t-1][0])>0 && (count1[t+x-1][1]-count1[t-1][1])>0 && (count1[t+x-1][2]-count1[t-1][2])>0)
			{
	//			pins(t);pin(x);
				return 1;
			}
		}
	}
	//pr("*");
	return 0;
}

int binary()
{
	int s,h,mid;
	s=3;h=l;

	while(s<=h)
	{
		mid=((s+h)/2);
	//	pr("mid= ");pin(mid);
		if(find(mid))
		{
			h=mid-1;
		}
		else
			s=mid+1;
	}
	return s;
}

int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		
		int i,j,k,n,m;
		ss(a);
	//	puts(a);
		clr(count1);
		l=strlen(a);

		if(a[0]=='R')
			count1[0][0]=1;
		if(a[0]=='G')
			count1[0][1]=1;
		if(a[0]=='B')
			count1[0][2]=1;

	//	pins(count1[0][0]);pins(count1[0][1]);pin(count1[0][2]);
		
		f(i,1,l)
		{
			if(a[i]=='R')
			{
				count1[i][0]=count1[i-1][0]+1;
				count1[i][1]=count1[i-1][1];
				count1[i][2]=count1[i-1][2];
			}
			if(a[i]=='G')
			{
				count1[i][1]=count1[i-1][1]+1;
				count1[i][0]=count1[i-1][0];
				count1[i][2]=count1[i-1][2];
			}
			if(a[i]=='B')
			{
				count1[i][2]=count1[i-1][2]+1;
				count1[i][0]=count1[i-1][0];
				count1[i][1]=count1[i-1][1];
			}
	//		pins(count1[i][0]);pins(count1[i][1]);pin(count1[i][2]);
		}


		pin(binary());


	}
	return 0;
}
